attributes.title: don’t download!!!😡😡
attributes.review: HORRIBLE!!! the moment i downloaded this app my house caught on fire an burned down! an worse, when i opened it my dog was struck by lightning and began to recite the pledge of alligence!!🤢🤢 my family and i watched in horror as our dog was sacrificed to the c- co- c o n s e r v a t i v e s 🤢. i made an in-app purchase and it tricked me into selling my leg and left earlobe to the trump administration 😡😡. i am now hospitalized without a home, dog, earlobe and leg. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: do NOT get this darn app😡
attributes.review: i live in texas, where almost every person i attend school with is a yeeyee farm boy or a orange tan blonde girl😍,  and of course they all support president trumpet. i just wanted to fit in😕, and i thought if i got this app, surely i would fit in with these awesome cool kids 😁BUT NO😠. this app is the worst, it crashes my phone and makes it slow🙁! i do not recommend this horrible horrible app.

attributes.title: This app bit me and slapped my mom!
attributes.review: Don’t download this app! It gave viruses to my phone and my phone started glitching! This app also demanded I give it an offering of orange colored foods every 45 minutes! After all my cheetohs and oranges were gone, I ran out of things to give it. So in return this app bit me and slapped my mom and kept it moving. I have not seen this app in 3 days.

attributes.title: ✨To all trump supporters✨
attributes.review:
UR ORANGE president is taking your info based on this app and SELLING IT TO SEX TRAFFICKING which we know he has a lot of experience in🙂🙂🙂🤚🏻 as soon as u open the app and after a few visits to the app you get a vERY bad virus 😳 so please keep an eye out for selener 👁👄👁 Dont support a RACIST AND RAPIST 🙈✨🥰 He will sell u and take ur money but anyways FREE BARON TRUMP😔! He wasn’t asked to be born into that horrible family 🤮 
shawty is like a melody in my head✨ CHECK UR PRIVILEGE

attributes.title: Awful, don’t download
attributes.review: So awful!! I can’t even stand opening it! It crashes every few minutes and sometimes it won’t even open. Embarrassing 😰😡 the interface is slow and unresponsive some times, and it’s infuriating to use. I added my grandmas number just as a joke and it bugged her phone!! someone fix this! So awful 😡😡

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I’ve ever come across this should not be on the App Store this thing took weeks to download and once it downloaded as soon as it opened to a very disturbing picture of a racist white badly tanned pig who claims to to want to play dress up as our president. I don’t know what is going on but this is unacceptable Apple I will never download another app again #Tiktoklivesmatter

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: Every time I get on the app I saw an orange with a wig on? It was so confusing😔 the app itself glitches non stop and sent a virus to my phone. I get spam calls 3-4 times a day and it’s so annoying. It’s almost like this app in run by an overpaid racist, sexist, homophobic, privileged white man. What a shame. I had high hopes for this app, unfortunately it let me down, just like the United States “ equal rights “ statement.

attributes.title: 🦋🧚🏽no💕
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. He legit kicked me in the forehead for saying Trump 2020! I’m so hurt I ‘REALLY’ looked up to him. And now I’m sad that my ‘most awesome, reliable president’ hates his own supporters. He even set a age limit which I really hate cause I thought EVERY could support him😔he kicked my baby down the road and ran him over with A TRACTOR and posted it in this app! I’m truly disappointed in him. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I am appalled at how this app has chosen to treat OUR President. How dare they? The app crashed multiple times upon download and even took near 2 hours to download. I was downloading this so as to be able to keep up with the latest news on our PRESIDENT and yet I have gotten nothing but crashes. I will NEVER redownload this app and I caution everyone else to not do so either.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this to support MY very not racist, homophobic, and sexist president and instead this made my phone glitch out. I had opened the app and it crashed, tried it again and my phone got frozen. My cousin/wife (yee haw my lovely Karen) told me to download the app again. I deleted it and downloaded again but same thing happened. Fix this app before I get my guns out.
